mistral:7b-instruct: This EPO plan from Queensland Country Health fits your profile as it offers comprehensive coverage for hospitalization due to hypertension and other medical conditions, along with outpatient services, prescription drugs, and preventive care. The plan's monthly premium of $300 is suitable for an upper-middle income bracket, while the $500,000 coverage ensures financial protection in case of significant medical expenses. Moreover, the max out-of-pocket expense limit of $6500 helps manage costs effectively, given your moderate risk level (72.0).
